attributes.description: {'title': 'Brain activation patterns in major depressive disorder and work stress-related long-term sick leave ', 'doi': '10.3109/10253890.2011.646347', 'relationType': 'Direct', 'isCausal': '', 'SupportingText': 'The present findings showed pronounced similarities in activation patterns across the groups, suggesting largely intact functional networks. However, during the more demanding cognitive task (n-back), the LTSL subjects showed a reduction in prefrontal cortex activation.', 'correctness': 1}
